text: @ByronYork Sure. Repub voters tend to skew older. Get them in a crowded room, hand out masks (nothing says "Coronavirus is a Dem hoax" like handing out masks to protect audience from a killer pathogen), have Trump refuse to wear a mask, watch Repub electorate die off in the coming weeks.
